entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
